headline: AI Chips Update - Revolutionary Cooling Enhances AI Data Center Efficiency
summary: Phononic has introduced an innovative cooling solution designed to enhance the performance and efficiency of AI data centers. Their "Thermal Kit" employs advanced solid-state cooling technology to address the challenges of heat management in AI workloads, which often cause significant performance throttling. By integrating thermoelectric coolers with liquid cooling systems, this solution offers precise, node-level thermal control, reducing energy use and infrastructure costs while improving...

headline: MiTAC Computing Unveils Advanced AI Cluster and Cooling Solutions at Supercomputing 2025
summary: MiTAC Computing Technology, a global leader in high-performance and energy-efficient server solutions, is proud to announce its participation at the Supercomputing (SC) 2025 (November 18–20, St. Louis, Missouri), booth 3916. Under the theme "AI Cluster Power – Cool Fast Scale Faster" MiTAC will showcase its modular highly scalable rack infrastructure for demanding AI and HPC workloads demonstrating capabilities from single servers to cluster integration focusing on liquid cooling and energy-effi
